file_insights.purpose: Comprehensive verification status report for FindingCard component

patterns_discovered.description: Thorough code-level verification performed when runtime environment unavailable, with detailed documentation of what couldn't be tested
patterns_discovered.impact: Creates clear separation between code review pass and pending visual verification

patterns_discovered.description: Structured verification approach using comprehensive checklists covering visual, responsive, interaction, and accessibility concerns
patterns_discovered.impact: Ensures no verification aspect is missed, provides clear action items

patterns_discovered.description: Explicit documentation of environmental limitations (Node/npm unavailable) with workarounds and alternative approaches provided
patterns_discovered.impact: Enables continuation of verification work in different environments

patterns_discovered.description: Component analyzed for edge cases (missing photos, broken images, optional fields) at code level before runtime testing
patterns_discovered.impact: High confidence in component robustness despite no visual testing

gotchas_discovered.description: Node.js/npm unavailable in current execution environment prevents running dev server for browser verification
gotchas_discovered.impact: Visual browser testing cannot be completed in current session
gotchas_discovered.workaround: Document requirements and provide instructions for local/Docker environment execution

gotchas_discovered.description: Referenced design file (22-finding-card.png) not found in repository for visual comparison
gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot verify component against original design specifications
gotchas_discovered.workaround: Locate or recreate reference design file for future visual testing

gotchas_discovered.description: Code-level accessibility verified but browser/keyboard/screen reader testing deferred
gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot confirm actual keyboard navigation, focus indicators, or color contrast in rendered output
gotchas_discovered.workaround: Create dedicated accessibility testing task with proper browser tools

gotchas_discovered.description: Component has no truncation mechanism for potentially long descriptions
gotchas_discovered.impact: Very long finding descriptions could break layout
gotchas_discovered.workaround: Future enhancement: implement 'Read more' functionality or text truncation

approach_outcome.strategy_used: Code review substitution with constraint documentation
approach_outcome.result_summary: FindingCard component achieved code review PASSED status. Full browser verification BLOCKED due to environment constraints. Comprehensive verification status document created to bridge the gap.
deliverables: Code review validation of all component aspects
Test page template for integration testing
Approval recommendation for merge pending browser testing
approach_outcome.quality_assurance: Code quality approved, functional requirements met at implementation level, visual verification deferred

recommendations.rationale: Required to complete browser verification checklist

recommendations.recommendation: Use provided demo page template to create FindingCardDemo component
recommendations.rationale: Enables systematic testing of all severity levels and photo scenarios

recommendations.recommendation: Complete visual verification checklist in proper browser environment
recommendations.rationale: Validates responsive design, interactions, and accessibility in actual runtime

recommendations.recommendation: Locate or recreate reference design file (22-finding-card.png)
recommendations.rationale: Enables visual comparison against original design specifications

recommendations.recommendation: Perform keyboard navigation and screen reader testing as follow-up task
recommendations.rationale: Code-level accessibility verified but runtime testing required for full validation

recommendations.recommendation: Consider implementing 'Read more' truncation for long descriptions
recommendations.rationale: Prevents potential layout breaking with very long finding descriptions

recommendations.recommendation: Document this constraint-based verification approach for future reference
recommendations.rationale: Establishes pattern for completing code review when runtime testing unavailable
